products.description:
Made in China

2 year limited warranty

Product care instructions: Machine wash gentle cycle in cold water with mild detergent. Do not use chlorine bleach. Tumble dry on low heat or line dry.
products.long_description:
Our bedding with 37.5® technology continuously adapts to maintain your ideal microclimate, for comfortablesleep all night long. Blend of 76% cotton, 22% 37.5® polyester and 2% spandex. 320-thread-count sateen weave.

The benefits of 37.5® technology add up. With more layers, the longer you’ll sleep in your perfect comfort zone.

ExactFitâ„¢ and SmartFitâ„¢ designs keep your sheets snug and secure. Make your bed quickly by aligning the Logicâ„¢ Labels on all Sleep Number® bedding. Exclusive fabric design moves with you and retains its shape for a smooth fit across most mattress heights.

Set includes: One flat sheet, one fitted sheet and two pillowcases.

Soft, breathable lyocell blend offers conforming comfort all night long. Now with ExactFit sheet design for a flexible fit that moves with you. 300-thread-count sateen weave for luxurious softness. Fits any mattress up to 15 inches.

Designed and crafted in the USA.

Our Lyocell Ultra sheets are proudly designed at Sleep Number headquarters in Minneapolis, MN. Made from imported materials, they’re then cut and sewn in the USA by a family-owned company with more than 30 years of expertise.

Includes

Sheet set includes one flat sheet, one fitted sheet and two pillowcases. Split King contains two Twin Extra-Long fitted sheets.

products.name: Lyocell Ultra Sheet Set
products.meta_description: Find the Sleep Number 's highest quality Lyocell Ultra Sheets Sets, developed with durable fibers to ensure comfortable and long lasting pillowcases.

data.html:
Soft, breathable lyocell blend offers conforming comfort all night long. Now with ExactFit sheet design for a flexible fit that moves with you. 300-thread-count sateen weave for luxurious softness. Fits any mattress up to 15 inches.

Designed and crafted in the USA.

Our Lyocell Ultra sheets are proudly designed at Sleep Number headquarters in Minneapolis, MN. Made from imported materials, they’re then cut and sewn in the USA by a family-owned company with more than 30 years of expertise.

Includes

Sheet set includes one flat sheet, one fitted sheet and two pillowcases. Split King contains two Twin Extra-Long fitted sheets. 

Learn more. See our How-to videos.

Find the ideal bedding combination. Mix and match colors using Bedding Planner.

Fitted sheet: 68% lyocell, 27% cotton, 5% elastane

Flat sheet and pillowcases: 70% lyocell, 30% cotton

Made in the USA of fabric imported from China.

Machine wash gentle cycle in cold water with mild detergent. Do not use chlorine bleach. Tumble dry on low heat or line dry.

Do not pour detergent directly on sheets and avoid chlorine bleach or detergents with added bleach or whiteners.

Do not use fabric softener, overload washing machine, or wash with non-bedding items. These increase friction, which can break down fabrics or cause pilling.

Drying
Remove from dryer while slightly damp to prevent wrinkles. Do not use dryer sheets, as they may weaken and break down the yarns.

Storage
Store sheets in a cool, dry, well-ventilated area. Do not store in plastic containers as this may cause fabric to discolor.

FYI
Certain hair and skincare products may discolor sheets and pillowcases or cause pilling.
STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEXÂ® certification keeps you and your family safe from harmful substances. Label ID and test institute: 18.HUS.47931 HOHENSTEIN HTTI

products.name: Climate360â„¢ Total Protection Mattress Pad
products.merchant_message: Exclusively for our Climate360â„¢ smart bed

data.html:
Receive a 10-year limited warranty to guarantee your mattress is protected from almost any stain when you buy our Total Protection Mattress Pad with your new Sleep Number® bed.

Must be purchased at same time and on same receipt as mattress.

Waterproof, stain resistant and hypoallergenic. Features Nano-Cool Knit fabric that moves heat rapidly away from your body for a cooler sleep surface.

Standard size fits mattresses up to 16 inches. Low profile size fits mattresses up to 10 inches.

STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® certification keeps you and your family safe from harmful substances. Label ID and test institute: 18.HUS.57195 HOHENSTEIN HTTI

Twin   39" W X 75" L

Twin XL   39" W X 80" L

California Twin XL   36" W X 84" L

Full   54"W X x 75" L

Queen   60" W X 80" L

King   76" W X 80" L

California King    72" W X 84" L

FlexTop King  76" W X 80"L

FlexTop California King   72" W X 84" L

Note: A Split King mattress would need 2 Twin XL mattress pads.

A Split California King mattress would need 2 California Twin XL mattress pads.

Top Fabric: 70% polyester, 30% nylon. Skirt: 92% polyester, 8% spandex.

Machine wash cold with mild detergent. Tumble dry low gentle. Do not bleach, iron or dry clean. Waterproof, stain resistant and hypoallergenic.

products.name: DualTempâ„¢ Individual Layer
products.reference_description:
Add a DualTempâ„¢ Layer and sleep at the perfect temperature

Active air technology evenly distributes warm or cool air at the touch of a button. Details
products.meta_description: Sleep Number's DualTemp Individual layer helps adjust your sides temperature allowing for the blissful night's sleep you deserve.
products.merchant_message: 24 Month Financing for a Limited Time.

data.html:
Add the DualTempâ„¢ individual layer to any bed and sleep up to 35% cooler or warmer*. Finally, the blissful cooling sleep you deserveâ€”comfortably priced.

  • Active air technology delivers enhanced airflow performance and ultimate comfort
  • Choose from multiple temperature settings--from cool to warm--at the touch of a button
  • Universal design works on either side of the bed, left or right
  • Timer allows for automatic shutoff whenever you choose, in one hour increments, up to nine hours

Plus, 12-month special financingâ€  with a Sleep NumberÂ® credit card.

Note: While the Dual Temp Layer can be used with footwarming or a heated blanket on the bed at the same time, only one should be turned on at a time.

• One individual size DualTempâ„¢ Individual layer
  • One heating and cooling system
  • One DualTempâ„¢ remote control
  • Power Cord
  • DualTemp™ Individual Layer user guide available here.

Sizes: L x W

Half Queen: 78.5" x 29.5"
Half King: 78.5" x 37.5"
Half Cal King: 82.5" x 32.5"

• Spot clean layer with a warm, mild soap and water solution. Follow the cleaning instructions on the care label.
  • Clean the heating and cooling source with a light vacuum over the surface of the unit once every 3-6 months.

products.name: Total Protection Mattress Pad
products.description: Get a 10-year limited warranty to protect your mattress from almost any stain.
products.long_description:
Waterproof, stain-resistant, and offers a 10-year limited warranty on your Sleep NumberÂ® bed.

Helps move heat away so you stay cooler. Now featuring Nano-Cool Knit fabric that moves heat rapidly away from your body for a cooler, more comfortable sleep surface. When you buy our Total Protection mattress pad at the same time as your new SLEEP NUMBERÂ® bed, you'll receive a 10-year limited warranty to guarantee your mattress is protected from almost any stain life can throw at it. The ultimate in mattress protection is waterproof, stain resistant and hypoallergenic. Fits mattresses up to 16 inches. Logicâ„¢ Label takes the guesswork out of where to start making your bed.

Twin: 38 x 75   Twin Extra-Long: 38 x 80      Full: 54 x 75
Queen: 60 x 80       Eastern King: 76 x 80   California King: 72 x 84  
California Twin XL: 36 x 84  FlexTopÂ® King: 76 x 80 FlexTopÂ® California King: 72 x 84

Made in USA

Warranty: 10-Year Limited Warranty

products.name: Total Encasement Mattress Cover
products.description:
• Designed for the Sleep Number® bed
  • Blocks bed bugs, dust mites and allergens
  • Logic™ Label makes it easier to make your bed
products.long_description:
The Total Encasement Mattress Pad is designed exclusively for the SLEEP NUMBER® bed. Zippered cover fully encases mattress and hose openings. Soft-knit fabric is a silky-smooth polyester on the surface. The reverse side of the mattress pad features a scientifically-tested polyurethane bond shown to block bed bugs, dust mites and allergens and is waterproof. Logic™ Label takes the guesswork out of where to start making your bed. The bed bug protector mattress pad is made in China.

NOTE: Should not be used with a FlexFit™ 1, FlexFit™2 or FlexFit™ 3 adjustable Base.

Warranty: 10-Year Limited Warranty

AVAILABLE MATTRESS PAD SIZES:
SINGLE CHAMBER
Twin: 39 x 75
Twin Extra-Long: 39 x 80
Queen: 60 x 80

DUAL CHAMBER
Full: 54 x 75
Queen: 60 x 80
Expanded Queen: 66 x 80
California King: 72 x 84

products.meta_description: Sleep Number's Total Encasement Mattress Pad is designed to help block bed bugs, dust mites and allergens. Sleep better with the ultimate mattress protector!

products.name: Warming Layer
products.description:
• A layer of comfort over your mattress pad
  • Dual controls for personalized warmth
  • Ideal for couples with different sleeping temperatures
  • Logic™ Label makes it easier to make your bed
products.long_description:
The warming heated mattress pad layer from Sleep Number® allows you to turn down your thermostat and still stay toasty warm. Couples sleep comfortably with adjustable temperature controls for each side. Soft, washable 100% polyester microfleece has no bulky wires. Anchor bands at corners hold it in place on top of your mattress pad. Logic™ Label takes the guesswork out of where to start making your bed. Made in China.

NOTE: Should not be used with a FlexFit+™ or FlexFit™ Adjustable Base

Warranty: 5-Year Limited Warranty

AVAILABLE MATTRESS LAYER SIZES:
Queen: 60 x 80
Expanded Queen: 66 x 80
Eastern King: 76 x 80
California King: 72 x 84
products.meta_description: The warming comfort heated mattress pad layer from Sleep NumberÂ® allows you to turn down your thermostat and still stay toasty warm. Shop Now.

products.meta_description: Sleep Number's hypoallergenic Down Comforters are specially designed, with temperature balancing  technology, to keep you comfortable all year.

products.name: Pur Down Comforter
products.long_description:
Our lofty Pur-Down™ comforters are machine washable, fast drying and hypoallergenic.  No-shift construction provides even warmth.  Choose three levels of warmth for your ideal comfort.

Featuring luxurious 700-fill-power down for superior loft and long-lasting quality.  These comforters are hypoallergenic, machine washable and fast-drying with pur-down™ antimicrobial fill.  Features corner loops.  If you choose to use a duvet, you can attach duvet ties to corner loops to hold comforter in place.

  • Light Warmth
    For warm sleepers.  Ultra soft, 400 thread count, 100% sateen cotton cover with no shift  14” diamond box construction provides even distribution of warmth.
    Available in Twin, Queen, and Eastern/California King
  • Medium Warmth
    For most sleepers. Ultra soft, 400 thread count, 100% sateen cotton cover with no shift  16” diamond box construction provides even distribution of warmth.
    Available in Twin, Queen, and Eastern/California King
  • Extra Warmth
    For chilly sleepers. Ultra soft, 400 thread count, 100% sateen cotton cover with no shift  18” diamond box construction provides even distribution of warmth.
    Available in Queen, and Eastern/California King

Sizing;
Twin: 68” x 88”
Queen: 88” x 96”
Eastern King: 107” x 96”
California King: 100” x 100”

Poduct care instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach or dry clean.

Filled and finished in the USA of imported materials
10 Year limited warranty
products.meta_description:
Our lofty Pur-Down comforters are machine washable, fast drying and hypoallergenic.  No-shift construction provides even warmth.  Choose three levels of warmth for your ideal comfort.

Featuring luxurious 700-fill-power down for superior loft and long-lasting quality.  These comforters are hypoallergenic, machine washable and fast-drying with pur-down™ antimicrobial fill.  Features corner loops.  If you choose to use a duvet, you can attach duvet ties to corner loops to hold comforter in place.

products.name: Warming Blanket
products.description:
• Adjustable warmth controls for each side
  • Turn down your thermostat and save energy
  • Soft and lightweight polyester fleece
products.long_description:
Features adjustable warmth controls on each side. This oversized blanket heats evenly for all-over warmth with no hot or cold spots. Soft, washable 100% polyester ultra-plush fleece has no bulky wires, and shuts off automatically after 10 hours. Blanket and control are UL® classified as non-hazardous low voltage for added protection even if blanket becomes wet.

Made in China.

Product care:
Machine wash cold or warm; tumble dry low until completely dry. Do not bleach or iron.

Warranty: 5-Year Limited Warranty
products.meta_description: Recommended for couples with different ideal sleeping temperatures, Sleep Number's soft warming and heating blanket is comfortable & adjustable on each side.
products.merchant_message: Ideal for couples. Features adjustable warmth controls on both sides.

products.name: Create Your Perfect Comforterâ„
products.description:
Complete Comforter Set

  • Use this guide for your first time comforter purchase
Create Your Perfect Comforter
Step by Step Guide
Start Customizing Now

Individual Sides

  • Choose the finest down or premium down
    alternative
  • Customize warmth from lightweight to
    extra warm
  • Note:Unless you are selecting two of the
    same sides (Quantity 2) you will need to
    make two selections and add to cart
    separately.
products.long_description:
Are you too hot while your partner's too cold? Our exclusive comforter is a breakthrough solution for couples with different warmth preferences. It can be customized on each side for individual comfort without compromise. Click to see how easy it is to Create Your Perfect Comforterâ„ .

Pick your size - King or Queen.

STEP 1: Customize Your Warmth.
Select your ideal warmth level: choose from light warmth if you are always warm, to extra warmth if you are often cold.

STEP 2: Choose Your Fill
Once you've selected your warmth level, choose your fill: luxurious, 700 fill-power pur-down or light-as-air PrimaLoftÂ® down alternative.

STEP 3: Add a Duvet Cover (optional)
Extend the life of your comforter by protecting it with one of our exclusive duvet covers. Add color, style and an exclusive solution for your unique comfort needs.

Customize two sides for a complete comforter.

Customized warmth level and fill included in price.

Completed Sizes (2-sides):
Queen 88x96
King 107x96

Made in China. Filled and finished in USA.

Warranty: 10-Year Limited Warranty

Product care instructions: Machine wash using a commercial-size, front-loading washer and dryer; wash and rinse in cold water, gentle cycle with mild detergent. Tumble dry on low heat with clean tennis balls, turning frequently to avoid scorching or professionally dry clean. Do not bleach.
products.meta_description: Our exclusive comforter can be customized on each side for individual comfort without compromise. Click to see how easy it is to Create Your Perfect Comforterâ„ .
products.merchant_message: Individualized warmth for both of you

products.name: In Balance&Trade; Blanket
products.description:
• Cool comfort, helps you sleep comfortably
  • Minimizes temperature swings
  • Coordinates with In Balance™ sheets and duvet sets
products.long_description:
Outlast® Climadry®fill is designed to balance the temperature swings that can cause restless nightsâ€”to help you sleep more comfortably each and every night. The 300-thread-count, 100% cotton sateen cover is soft to the touch, yet provides a durable construction. Box quilting across the entire blanket keeps the fill from shifting. Innovative design features make it easy to make your bed. Our exclusive Logic™Label system perfectly positions your bedding every time.

Warranty: 10-Year Limited Warranty

Made in China

Outlast is a trademark of Outlast Technologies, Inc.

Product care:
Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle with mild detergent. Tumble dry on low heat until fill is completely dry; remove promptly. Do not bleach.
products.meta_description: Sleep Number's In  Balance blanket helps you sleep just right with our latest temperature balancing technology. Order yours & find cool comfort today!
products.merchant_message: Absorbs heat and releases it as you cool

products.name: Sleep Iq KidsÂ® K2 Bed
products.long_description:
• 8 inch thick mattress
  • Soft woven fabric
  • Family connected. Sleep perfected SleepIQ® technology lets you see how the whole family is sleeping.
  • Know the comfort they're getting. The bed adjusts and grows with them their Sleep Number® setting.
  • Lifts them up when they're down. Head tilt feature for reading in bed or comforting stuffy heads.
  • No more kiddos jumping out of bed. Alerts you when your child is out of bed or restless.
  • Stars for young dreamers. Make bedtime fun again with rewards for good sleep.
  • Night bright, night light. You can turn lights off remotely when they're sleeping tight.
  • Twinkle, tinkle. Soft under-bed light for when they get up during the night.
  • Monsters be gone! Sleepyheads rest easy with a fearless monster detector.
  • Not suitable for children under 4
products.meta_description: Sleep Number SleepIQ Kids K2 bed, So smart it takes their sleep to the next level.
